attributes.action: ‎[LIVERPOOL CARE PATHWAY] needs urgently reviewing.  Confusion reigns over the title!
attributes.additional_details:
The Liverpool Care Pathway?
The name alone is misleading, it is not just local to Liverpool, the county or the country for that matter.
Using that term does not indicate the gravity of the situation, it is not obvious from the name that the doctors have decided that they are dealing with an end of life care plan.
 ‎"End of Life Care Plan" is better.

Relatives should always be consulted.AND information available.
